org.researchstack.backbone.result

Class StepResult<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.researchstack.backbone.result.Result
      • org.researchstack.backbone.result.StepResult<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StepResult<T>
extends Result
    The StepResult class represents a result produced by a StepLayout to hold all child results of type T produced by the step.

    A step result is typically generated by the framework as the task proceeds. When the task completes, it may be appropriate to serialize it for transmission to a server, or to immediately perform analysis on it.

    For example, an QuestionStep object produces a result of type T that becomes a child of the StepResult object.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • StepResult

        public StepResult(Step step)
        Creates a StepResult from a Step.

        Using this constructor ensures that the StepResult has the correct identifier and answer format for the corresponding step.

        Parameters:
        step - the step from which to create the StepResult

        the result with the default identifier

      • setResult

        public void setResult(T result)
        Sets the result using the default key, useful when there is only a single result.
        Parameters:

      • getResultForIdentifier

        public T getResultForIdentifier(java.lang.String identifier)
        Returns the result for the given identifier, use this when there are multiple results for the step.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier used as the key for storing this result
        Returns:
        the result for the given identifier

      • setResultForIdentifier

        public void setResultForIdentifier(java.lang.String identifier,
                                   T result)
        Sets the result for the given identifier, use when there are multiple results for the step.

        If there is only one result, use the setResult(T) convenience method instead.

        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier for the result
        result - the result to save

      • getAnswerFormat

        public AnswerFormat getAnswerFormat()
        Gets the AnswerFormat for this step result. May be useful when processing the result.
        Returns:
        the answer format associated with the step
